devdoc.details: This contract demonstrates a contract inheriting from TxAuthDataVerifier to update variables with signature verification.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract by setting a signer address for the TxAuthDataVerifier.

params.signerAddress: The address used for transaction data signature verification.

returns._0: The current value of the bytes variable.

params._txAuthData: The transaction authentication data to hash

returns._0: The keccak256 hash of the encoded `TxAuthData`
The current nonce of the user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setSigner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner

params._signer: The address of the new signer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateVariables(uint256,address,bytes,ui.details: Requires the transaction to be authenticated via `requireTxDataAuth`.

params._addressVariable: The new value for the address variable.
params._blockExpiration: The block number until which the transaction is considered valid.
params._bytesVariable: The new value for the bytes variable.
params._intVariable: The new value for the integer variable.
params._signature: The signature proving the authenticity of the transaction data.

devdoc.title: Example Multiple Inputs Contract

BlockExpired().notice: Custom error for handling signature expiry

InvalidSignature().notice: Custom error for handling invalid signatures

getBytesVariable().notice: Returns the current value of the bytes variable.

getMessageHash((uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Generates a hash of the given `TxAuthData`

getUserNonce(address).notice: Retrieves the current nonce for a given user

nonces(address).notice: Mapping to track the nonces of users to prevent replay attacks

updateVariables(uint256,address,bytes,ui.notice: Updates the contract variables after verifying the transaction signature.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows updating certain variables only after verifying the transaction authenticity with a signature.
